FuncDef: This command configures an IPv6 prefix in the router advertisement messages. To support multiple IPv6 prefixes, use multiple prefix statements. No prefix is advertised until explicitly configured using prefix statements.

ParaDef.Info: The IP prefix for prefix list entry in dotted decimal notation. Values-ipv6-prefix|x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces)|, |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d|, |x: |[0 to FFFF]H, |d: |[0 to 255]D, ipv6-prefix-length|0 to 128|.
Specifies a route must match the most significant bits and have a prefix length. Values-1 to 128.
